courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende a cómo crear una página web con WordPress, Elementor Kits y Elementor Pro, sin saber de programación.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS CREAR UNA PÁGINA WEB CON WORPDRESS, ELEMENTOR KITS Y ELEMENTOR PRO?


WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.


Elementor es un plugin gratuito para WordPress que sirve para crear y maquetar páginas web con todo tipo de diseños a través de un editor visual de tipo drag and drop que permite arrastrar y añadir elementos de manera sencilla y rápida, simplifica de manera extraordinaria el diseño de páginas web con WordPress, sobre todo para personas que no son expertas en código y programación web y quieren crear sitios desde cero sin las limitaciones del constructor nativo de WordPress.


Además, Elementor posee una interfaz intuitiva y muy visual que permite trabajar a tiempo real sobre el frontend, es decir, sobre el diseño de la página en la parte visual.


Elementor Pro es la versión de pago del plugin Elementor. Esta versión pagada incorpora widgets, plantillas, el editor de temas además de un soporte premium para resolver dudas y solucionar problemas.


Los kits de plantillas de Elementor son plantillas de páginas disponibles como colecciones, centradas en un tema o tipo de sitio web específico. Los kits de plantillas se crean como un grupo de plantillas individuales para un sitio web específico.


Los creadores de sitios pueden utilizar kits de plantillas para páginas individuales de un sitio. Por ejemplo, un kit de plantillas de sitio web inmobiliario comprende plantillas para cada página que una empresa inmobiliaria convencional necesita y plantillas para componentes específicos, a saber, formularios de contacto , ventanas emergentes , pies de página, encabezados, etc.

Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos su sitio web con WordPress, Elementor Kits y Elementor Pro, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su sitio web diseñado con su personalización y a su gusto.

¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo contratar un plan de hosting para crear tu sitio web con WordPress, Elementor Kits y Elementor Pro.

  • Cómo crear sitios web profesionales con WordPress, Elementor Kits y Elementor Pro.

  • Cómo instalar plantillas prediseñadas con Elementor Kits para comenzar a crear tu sitio web con WordPress y Elementor Pro.

  • Cómo personalizar el diseño de tu sitio web de forma profesional con el constructor visual de Elementor.

courseDetails.title: GIT, GitLab, GitHub Fundamentals for Software Developers
courseDetails.shortDescription: GIT, GitLab, GitHub Fundamentals for Software Developers, Basics of Work, Command Line, GUI, Intro to GIT for Beginners
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to program: GIT, GitLab, GitHub Fundamentals for Software Developers

GIT, GitLab, GitHub Fundamentals for Software Developers, Basics of work, Command Line & GUI, Intro to GIT for Beginners


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 210 countries and has been chosen by more than 520 000 students.


Importance of Git Skills for Software Developers and Effective Software Development at Enterprise Companies

Mastering Git, particularly in conjunction with platforms like GitLab and GitHub, is crucial for software developers and the overall success of software development within enterprise companies. Let's break down the significance of each skill set you mentioned:


  • Version Control: Git allows developers to track changes to code over time, creating a history of modifications. This enables easy backtracking to previous versions if errors occur or features need to be rolled back.

  • Collaboration: Git facilitates seamless collaboration among multiple developers working on the same codebase. Developers can work on different features concurrently, merge their changes, and resolve conflicts in a controlled manner.

  • Code Safety: Git acts as a safety net, allowing developers to experiment without fear of irreparably damaging the codebase. Branches and commits provide isolation for new features or bug fixes.


  • Command Line Proficiency: Understanding Git commands empowers developers to execute precise actions and troubleshoot issues effectively.

  • GUI Fluency: Graphical interfaces like those in GitLab and GitHub simplify common Git operations, making it more accessible for beginners and streamlining workflows.

  • Platform Compatibility: Familiarity with both GitLab and GitHub ensures adaptability across different development environments and collaborative projects.


  • Foundation for Growth: This introductory knowledge lays the groundwork for further exploration of Git's capabilities and advanced features.

  • Confidence Building: Mastering the basics empowers developers to contribute to projects and collaborate effectively, boosting confidence and engagement.

  • Industry Standard: Git is a ubiquitous tool in software development. Proficiency is essential for career advancement and employability.


Benefits for Enterprise Software Development

  • Enhanced Collaboration: Git facilitates effective communication and coordination among large teams, promoting efficient development and reducing bottlenecks.

  • Improved Code Quality: Version control, code reviews, and branching strategies contribute to higher code quality and fewer bugs.

  • Accelerated Development: Git's features, such as branching and merging, enable parallel development and faster release cycles.

  • Streamlined Onboarding: New developers can quickly get up to speed by accessing the project's Git repository and understanding its history.

  • Reduced Risk: Git's safety net and version control minimize the risk of code loss or corruption, protecting valuable intellectual property.


Git proficiency is indispensable for modern software developers and plays a vital role in driving successful software development at enterprise companies. Investing in Git training and fostering a culture of collaboration around Git practices yields significant benefits in terms of productivity, code quality, and overall project success.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. Course for any, who want to build a career at Software Development or improve their knowledge.

courseDetails.longDescription:
Take Control of Workplace Mental Health – Enrol Today!


Mental health is no longer just a personal issue—it’s a workplace priority. In today’s fast-paced work environment, stress, burnout, and anxiety have become all too common, affecting employee well-being and overall productivity. But what if you had the tools to create a supportive and mentally healthy workplace?


Our "Mental Health for the Workplace" course is designed to help professionals at all levels understand the impact of mental health in the workplace and take actionable steps to foster a positive and resilient work culture. Whether you're a manager, HR professional, team leader, or employee looking to support your colleagues, this course equips you with practical strategies to build a mentally healthy environment.


What You’ll Gain from This Course:

  • Recognize the Signs of Mental Health Challenges – Identify early warning signs of stress, burnout, and emotional exhaustion.

  • Build a Culture of Support and Inclusion – Learn how to create a workplace where employees feel valued and heard.

  • Manage Stress and Prevent Burnout – Discover practical techniques to reduce stress and maintain well-being.

  • Encourage Open Conversations – Develop communication skills to support mental health discussions at work.

  • Implement Workplace Mental Health Policies – Understand best practices and compliance guidelines for mental health.

  • The numerous benefits of having a workplace with a healthy mental health environment.


By enrolling in this course, you’ll be taking a crucial step toward making your workplace healthier, happier, and more productive. Mental health is everyone’s responsibility, and together, we can create environments where people thrive.


We include practical steps that you can take away today, practice and adapt to get the outcomes you are looking for.


This course is highly recommended for HR Departments, Learning and Development Departments to use as a resource for their organisations.


We hope you find the tools and resources included in this course useful.

Helen and Baba

courseDetails.title: Security Optimizer: Protege tu Sitio Web en WordPress 2025
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende a cómo proteger tu sitio web en WordPress de ataques y vulnerabilidades con el plugin Security Optimizer.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Security Optimizer es un plugin gratuito de WordPress desarrollado por SiteGround para proteger un sitio web de WordPress y prevenir una serie de amenazas como ataques de fuerza bruta, inicios de sesión comprometidos, fugas de datos y más.


¿CUÁLES SON LAS CARACTERÍSTICAS Y BENEFICIOS DE SECURITY OPTIMIZER?

El plugin ofrece características como:

  • Evitar el malware común.

  • Defenderte contra los ataques de fuerza bruta.

  • Añadir protección XSS avanzada para proteger carpetas críticas y que no se inyecten archivos maliciosos.

  • Ocultar tu versión de WordPress.

  • Eliminar el archivo readme.txt predeterminado.

  • Proteger el inicio de sesión.

  • Habilitar verificación en dos pasos (con Google Authenticator).

  • Cambiar la URL de inicio de sesión.

  • Impedir usar «admin» como nombre de usuario.

  • Las actividades quedan registradas en el Activity log y además facilita funciones para reaccionar ante posibles ataques desde la sección «Acciones después de un hackeo» para:

    • Cerrar sesión automáticamente a todos los usuarios.

    • Obligar a cambiar las contraseñas.

    • Reinstalar todos tus plugins.


Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos mejoraremos la seguridad de su sitio web en WordPress con el plugin Security Optimizer, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su sitio web protegido de ataques y vulnerabilidades.

courseDetails.shortDescription: Get an understanding of Interest rates, what they are used for, products, services applications & implications
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to "Financial Services – Understanding Interest Rates"


Interest rates sit at the core of every financial decision—personal, corporate, or governmental. Whether you're evaluating a mortgage, pricing a loan, or assessing investment returns, understanding how interest rates work is essential to making sound financial choices.


This course is designed to demystify the world of interest rates and provide you with the tools to make informed, strategic financial decisions.


In this practical, business-focused course, you’ll learn how different types of interest rates (such as APR, AER, nominal, and real rates among many others) influence lending, borrowing, and investment strategies.


You'll gain a clear understanding of how central banks use interest rate changes to guide economic stability, growth, and inflation management.


Through real-life scenarios, and industry examples, this course will show you how interest rate fluctuations impact consumer behaviour, corporate financing, and capital markets.


We’ll explore the differences between fixed and variable rates, learn how interest affects credit risk, and evaluate the broader macroeconomic role of interest rate policy.


This course is ideal for finance professionals, corporate decision-makers, analysts, bankers, and those seeking clarity on how interest rates affect the financial services industry.


Whether you're part of a start-up, a multinational corporation, or preparing for a finance career, the insights here will strengthen your ability to work effectively with interest-bearing products.


By the end of this course, you'll be confident in your understanding, and ability, by extension in your work, to apply interest rate concepts to budgeting, investment planning, credit decisions, risk analysis—unlocking sharper, more strategic thinking in any financial setting.


Enrol today and gain a critical edge in navigating the interest-rate-driven world of financial services.


Best regards,

Baba Oyewole FCCA
targetAudiences: Staff and Professionals in Finance Ministries

courseDetails.longDescription:
¿QUIERES CREAR UNA PÁGINA WEB PARA VENDER PRODUCTOS DE AMAZON Y GANAR COMISIONES POR LAS VENTAS?


El Programa de Afiliados de Amazon es un programa de marketing de afiliación que permite a las páginas web crear enlaces y ganar comisiones por cualquier venta generada a través de estos enlaces.


Proporcionarás a tus usuarios la seguridad de realizar sus compras en una página web de confianza y cuando lo hagan, ganarás entre un 3% y un 10% en comisiones por venta generada.

Además, podrás aprovecharte de las diferentes promociones, ofertas y novedades de Amazon para hacer más atractiva tu oferta. Unirse al Programa de Afiliados es completamente gratis y su uso es sencillo.


¿CÓMO FUNCIONA LA PLATAFORMA DE WORDPRESS?


WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.

courseDetails.title: CyberSecurity Bootcamp: The Ultimate Beginner's Course
courseDetails.shortDescription: Knowledge that everyone must have. Learn how to protect your personal data from hackers. Take cyber security seriously.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Do you know what is the biggest threat in Cyber Security? The humans, it is so obvious. It’s all of us. The majority of security britches are actually being driven through social engineering and human interaction. Because we individually and collectively, just not taking cybersecurity seriously. We don’t know how to prevent the risks, the threats and vulnerabilities that exist in our behaviors and habits. We don’t have enough knowledge and training. We don’t teach ourselves to behave correctly when we use computers and electronic devices.

We must be aware of the correct simple things we need to do. Like best practices and general cybersecurity simple rules. And when we don’t do this, we open our doors widely for unauthorized access to our personal information to anyone. If we just know how to not do silly things and do things that can lead to compromise. We are all going to be more secure.

This is what our course is all about. We will show how easy it is to follow just a few simple cybersecurity practices. That will keep your personal information safe from unauthorized access and will keep you away from troubles.

The purpose of this course is to help you understand how to protect the personal data you have recorded on your computers, laptops and mobile devices. You will understand what the best practices are. How simple it is to secure your devices. And how this can prevent attacks and make your devices more secure.

You will learn what Social Engineering is and how the hackers are using it. Why must you keep your software always updated. What is the advantage of using strong passwords and password managers? You will understand why it’s important to enable 2FA/MFA for all your accounts. Also, what is device encryption, why you need it and how it protects you. Why you should avoid using public Wi-Fi and how VPN can protect you.

Why you must use antivirus software, from what attacks it can protect you. How to be cautious and how to prevent data breaches of your personal data and identity.

We will explain you what Malware is and its types:

- Trojan Horse

- Adware

- Spyware

- Browser Hijacking

- Virus

- Worms

- Scareware

You will learn how to recognize phishing emails, how to browse safely, and communicate securely.

At the end of the course you will know how to protect your electronic devices. You know the meaning of the main cybersecurity threats and terminology and how to recognize them.

We have created a course for everyone who uses some kind of electronic device, uses the internet and wants to protect his personal data or learn more about the Cybersecurity threat.

The terminology is simply explained with interactive professional videos and examples.

Don’t wait, take this course and educate yourself. Educating yourself and others — is by far the most effective defense you can do against all faces of Cyber Attacks.

Start your Security Awareness training now. Take Cyber Security seriously.
targetAudiences: Everyone who is using electronic devices like computers, laptops and mobile phones.
Everyone who wants to know how to protect his personal data.

courseDetails.title: Prioritization Techniques for Decision Makers and Leaders
courseDetails.shortDescription: Prioritizing activities as a decision maker and leader
courseDetails.longDescription:
Prioritization in a Decision Making and Leadership role is key to success and achieving desired outcomes.

Whatever you may be responsible for:

Decision making in a business, unit, department or running your own business etc, requires a specific set of skills to become good at it.

These techniques can developed and utilised for the best outcomes.

These methods also depend on what your circumstances are, your deliverables, your tole as a decision maker etc.

Prioritization is defined as the action or process of deciding the relative importance or urgency of a thing or things.

There are ways to decide these and help you deploy time, money and other resources to getting things done.

Some of these techniques include:

- ABCDE Method

- Eisenhower Matrix

- Pareto's Principle (80/20 rule)

- Weighted Scoring method and some more.


These techniques themselves need good input and plenty of preparation to get the best out of them. They are not silver bullets, but will facilitate success in getting outcomes as a decision maker or leader.


Decision makers face a few common challenges which can be overcome. We look at some of them and how to overcome them.

- setting clear goals

- managing your time effectively

- minimizing distractions and many more strategies that help address these challenges.


There is also a look at features that can help you create an environment that fosters good decision making and prioritization. Creating an environment that helps everyone involved.

- encourage Feedback

- Growth Mindset

- A collegiate, but accountability culture


This course will help you understand the options you have when deciding on what Prioritization techniques to deploy in your specific situation as a decision maker.


This extensive, well-rounded course is designed to be a reference and resource for you to come back to at various times, addressing questions you might have relating to the very many areas covered. 


Thank you for stopping by and please feel free to reach out to me on LinkedIn or elsewhere as well as leave your feedback.


best regards,

Baba

courseDetails.title: Chess 101: Building a Strong Foundation
courseDetails.shortDescription: Mastering Chess Fundamentals: Your Step-by-Step Guide
courseDetails.longDescription:
The Ultimate Chess Training Program for Beginners

This comprehensive chess training program is designed for beginners and aspiring tournament players who are ready to take their game to the next level. It is perfect for anyone who already has a basic understanding of chess and wants to build on that foundation to achieve consistent improvement. If you’re eager to succeed in competitive chess, this course will provide the techniques and strategies you need to win more games and perform with confidence.

A Year-Long Program for Steady Progress

The program spans an entire year, mirroring the structure of a professional chess club. With 30 to 35 lessons spread out from September to June, it’s like having a weekly chess class with a dedicated instructor. Each session is carefully crafted to build your skills incrementally, ensuring you develop a deep and lasting understanding of the game.

Overcoming the Challenges of Chess Learning

One of the biggest challenges for chess learners is navigating the overwhelming amount of information available. Many books and tutorials are geared toward advanced players, leaving beginners to struggle with materials that are too complex. This often leads to frustration and inconsistent results—you might defeat a strong opponent one day and lose to a weaker one the next.

This course was created to eliminate that frustration. It focuses on bridging the gap between beginner and intermediate levels, providing a structured and accessible approach to chess education. By mastering the fundamentals and gradually introducing advanced concepts, you’ll gain the tools to play consistently and effectively in tournaments.

Engaging Lessons and Practical Exercises

The lessons in this course are designed to maximize your learning experience. Each topic is presented through engaging theoretical videos that explain key ideas in a clear and concise way. Illustrative games are included to demonstrate how these concepts work in practice, making it easier to connect theory with real-world gameplay.

To ensure you retain what you learn, every video concludes with a summary of key takeaways. You’ll also have access to tests and exercises specifically designed to reinforce the material and help you internalize the strategies. This active practice is essential for building confidence and improving your performance in real games.

Proven Methods from an Experienced Instructor

With over 20 years of experience teaching chess to players of all ages, I’ve carefully designed this program to reflect the proven methods used in successful chess clubs. By following the lessons and completing the exercises, you’ll develop a strong foundation and set yourself up for long-term success in chess.

Unlock Your Full Chess Potential

This course is more than just a collection of lessons—it’s a complete training program that gives you the knowledge, skills, and confidence to excel at chess. هل ترغب في دخول عالم القانون بثقة؟ هل تبحث عن دليل مبسط وعملي يمهّد لك الطريق لتصبح قانونيًا متمكنًا؟

  • كيفية إعداد دليل القضية وتحليل عناصرها.

courseDetails.title: Build a robust FinOps Azure Cost Reporting in 1 Day
courseDetails.shortDescription: Turn Raw Cloud Data into Meaningful FinOps Insights
courseDetails.longDescription:
in just 1 day?

When I say 1 day, I'm being very conservative.

If you have all the requirements in place, I risk to say that you may be able to build that even in a shorter period!

Big data size

So you have an idea (and I know you do), one year of raw billing data can range between 50GB to 100GB. For a matter of
comparison, if you were to save the entire Wikipedia in text format, it would be 30GB.

  1. The amount of raw data related to cost and usage is extremely huge.

  2. Manual processes in Excel were nearly impossible due to the data size, forcing summarization that led to the loss of
    critical details.

Third-Party tools

There are many third-party tools out there. Although they have many cool features, getting an existing third-party tools have
their own challenges:

  • They were prohibitively expensive.

  • Need to go through an exhausting Procurement process,
    most of them lacked the flexibility I needed for tailored
    analysis.

Open source tools

I will not lie to you. There are also good open source options
out there. Just Google it and you will find. I've done this already
and I can tell you what going to happen.

  • Huge amount of documentation, requiring lots of time to
    decode.

  • Require technical expertise that you don't have at hand.

  • Time wasted on trying to find the best option among all.

Why do you need it after all?

As a FinOps person, you need cost and usage data. And that's it. You know why. I know I'm talking here to a FinOps
practitioner. Maybe you have already taken your Practitioner Certification. Maybe you took the FOCUS free course or either
took your FOUCS certification.

I will not waste your time giving an exhaustive list of reasons why you need a robust cost reporting. Nevertheless, let me tell you the major ones based on my experience. I'm sure you will relate with some of them.

  • Without proper visibility, I saw firsthand how cloud
    spending could spiral out of control.

  • Unexpected cost spikes disrupting budgets,

  • Lack of clarity slowing decision-making.

Teams operating in silos can generate all sort of problems from a cost perspective. Without a robust, automated cost
analysis system, organizations are at risk of losing financial stability, limiting innovation, and falling behind competitors.

  1. They fail to align financial goals with technical operations,

  2. Leading to waste and inefficiency.

That's why I build it

Not acting was not an option to me. I first built this solution to solve my own real situation.

I explored existing solutions, but they all fell short. Expensive third-party SaaS platforms were out of reach for small teams
or companies without structured FinOps departments.

None of these options offered a simple, cost-effective, and scalable approach that FinOps professionals like me could
deploy themselves—until now.
targetAudiences: Not technical on Data Science nor Data Engineering.
Have a small team: 0 to 2 team members
Can’t afford a 3rd party Tool for Cloud Cost Management
Need more cloud cost and usage analytical capacity
Native Azure Cost Management is not enough.
Uses Azure as cloud service provider.

courseDetails.title: Managing Social Anxiety in the Workplace
courseDetails.shortDescription: Helping You and Your Organisation Understand and Manage Social Anxiety within Your Workplace
courseDetails.longDescription:
Managing Social Anxiety in the Workplace

The workplace is a dynamic environment that demands constant interaction, collaboration, and adaptability. For individuals grappling with social anxiety, these demands can be daunting, often leading to stress, reduced productivity, and missed opportunities for growth.

Social anxiety in the workplace is more than just shyness; it involves intense fear or apprehension about social situations, making everyday tasks feel overwhelming.


Why Addressing Social Anxiety Matters

Social anxiety can significantly hinder professional development. Employees may avoid public speaking, networking, or even casual team discussions due to fear of judgment or criticism. This avoidance not only impacts individual performance but can also reduce team cohesion and organizational success.


Understanding and managing workplace anxiety is essential for fostering inclusive and productive environments.


Common Triggers

Key situations that exacerbate social anxiety in the workplace include:

  • Presentations and Meetings: Speaking in front of peers can induce panic.

  • Networking Events: Fear of initiating or maintaining conversations.

  • Feedback Sessions: Worry about criticism from managers.

Example Impact

Consider a marketing professional who avoids presenting ideas during meetings due to social anxiety. By implementing techniques from this course, they can gradually build confidence, ensuring their valuable contributions aren’t overlooked.

This course isn’t just about overcoming challenges; it’s about empowering professionals to transform their anxiety into an opportunity for personal and professional growth.


Most importantly, it is a course to help Organisations provide actionable tools for their colleagues and participants in making the organisation function properly. It is a vital tool which can transform the individuals working within the organisation, and the organisation by extension.


What This Course Offers

This course provides practical tools to recognize and manage social anxiety in professional settings:


- Understanding Social Anxiety: Definitions, causes, and symptoms in workplace contexts.

- Identifying Triggers: Recognizing personal and environmental factors that cause anxiety.

- Impact of Social Anxiety on Careers: How it affects communication, collaboration, and leadership.

- Practical Coping Strategies: Techniques like mindfulness, CBT, and exposure therapy.

- Communication Skills: Improving verbal and non-verbal interaction.

- Building Confidence: Steps to overcome self-doubt and build self-esteem.

- Setting Boundaries: Maintaining healthy workplace relationships without compromising mental health.

- Dealing with Feedback and Criticism: Managing emotions when receiving constructive feedback.

- Thriving in High-Pressure Situations: Strategies to remain calm during meetings, presentations, and networking events.

- Sustaining Long-Term Change: Developing personalized action plans for ongoing improvement.


We welcome You and Your organisation to this vital course.

Please, feel free to reach out to us on LinkedIn if you need any further support or information.

Hele and Baba

Risk is something we live with daily in business and all around us. It is not so much as not to have ANY risks (where ideal), but by definition, carrying on in business is a risk and presents multiple risks. So, we need to explore ways we can manage those risks.

Risk management refers to the process of identifying, assessing, and mitigating risks that could potentially impact the business or organisation or performance of an institution or its clients.

This course explores:

- Various approaches to risk

- Various risks that could occur in any business or organisation

- Managing and mitigating risks

- Creating an environment of risk awareness and mitigation is normal


Some of the introductory concepts we look include:

- Common approaches to risk

- Risk Identification

- Risk Assessment

- Risk Measurement and Monitoring

- Risk Mitigation

- Regulatory Compliance and more


Overall, effective risk management is essential for maintaining business and financial stability, protecting against losses, and building trust and confidence among stakeholders.


Decision Makers and Leaders can develop the skills to managing risks, ensuring that the organisation and it's stakeholders are protected as well as served to the benefit of all.

courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to our program: Advanced Certificate in Digital Transformation by MTF Institute

Are you ready to move beyond the buzzwords and become the strategic architect of your organization's future? In a world where digital is the core of competitive advantage, this executive-level program is designed for ambitious professionals like you who want to lead, not just follow, the digital revolution.

This is more than just a course; it's a comprehensive journey to mastery. Forget chasing the latest tech trend. Here, you will deeply understand the interconnected strategies, business models, and leadership principles that drive real, sustainable change.


Master The 10 Pillars Of Digital Transformation And Emerge As A Strategic, Future-Ready Leader.


  • Architect an actionable transformation roadmap using proven strategic frameworks from top business schools.


  • Design powerful platform business models that leverage network effects and build thriving ecosystems.


  • Lead organizational change by fostering a culture of agility, innovation, and data-driven decision-making.


  • Evaluate core technologies like the Cloud, AI, and Big Data from a purely business-value perspective.



Your Comprehensive Journey to Digital Mastery

Digital Transformation is not a single project; it's a fundamental rewiring of how a business operates and creates value. We've structured this program as a logical, cumulative journey across ten in-depth modules. You will start with the essentials and progressively build upon your knowledge, ensuring you develop a holistic and integrated understanding.

You’ll begin by deconstructing the Foundations of Digital Transformation to establish a common language, then arm yourself with Strategic Frameworks for the Digital Age, applying powerful models like Jobs-to-be-Done. With this groundwork, you will dive into the most potent business architecture of our time: Platform Models and Digital Ecosystems, learning what truly separates companies like Apple and Amazon from the rest.

From there, we focus on execution. You will master The Customer-Centric Revolution, learn to build a world-class engine through Operational Excellence (Agile, DevOps), and tackle the most critical challenge: Leading the Change by shaping culture and designing the future of work.


Why This Program is Different

This course is delivered by the MTF Institute of Management, Technology & Finance, a global research institute and an official partner of industry leaders like IBM, Intel, and Microsoft. It is taught by Dr. Alex Amoroso, a seasoned expert in strategy with extensive experience across academia and industries from finance to tech.

Upon successful completion, you will receive two valuable credentials: a certificate from Udemy and an official Executive Certificate in Digital Transformation from the MTF Institute, providing a powerful credential for your professional profile.

If you are ready to stop reacting to disruption and start architecting the future, this is the program for you.


Click the "Enroll now" button to begin your transformation journey today!


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is present in 217 countries and has been chosen by more than 800 000 students.


Course Author:

Dr. Alex Amoroso is a seasoned professional with a rich background in academia and industry, specializing in research methodologies, strategy formulation, and product development. With a Doctorate Degree from the School of Social Sciences and Politics in Lisbon, Portugal, where she was awarded distinction and honour for her exemplary research, Alex Amoroso brings a wealth of knowledge and expertise to the table.

In addition to her doctoral studies, Ms. Amoroso has served as an invited teacher, delivering courses to a wide range of students from undergraduate level to business professionals and executives. Currently, as Head of the School of Business and Management at MTF, she leads the Product Development academic domain. At EIMT, where she also supervises doctoral students, Ms. Amoroso offers advanced instruction in research design and methodologies. Furthermore, she serves as a Research Consultant.

In synergy between academical and business experience, Ms. Amoroso achieved high results in business career, leading R&D activities, product development, strategic development, market analysis activities in wide range of companies. She implemented the best market practices in industries from Banking and Finance, to PropTech, Consulting and Research, and Innovative Startups.

Alex Amoroso's extensive scientific production includes numerous published articles in reputable journals, as well as oral presentations and posters at international conferences. Her research findings have been presented at esteemed institutions such as the School of Political and Social Sciences and the Stressed Out Conference at UCL, among others.

With a passion for interdisciplinary collaboration and a commitment to driving positive change, Alex Amoroso is dedicated to empowering learners and professionals for usage of cutting edge methodologies for achieving of excellence in global business world.

courseDetails.shortDescription: Introductional course, Usage of Research and Analytical Methodologies in Business and Science
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: Business & Science Method, Analysis & Research Methodologies by MTF Institute


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 210 countries and has been chosen by more than 520 000 students.


Course Author:

Cristiana Silva is a senior education technician with 4 years' experience in coordinating pedagogical and social projects in Higher Education Institutions and Private Social Solidarity Institutions. She began her work in an academic environment, where she obtained her Master's Degree in Education, in the specialization area of Adult Education and Community Intervention at the University of Minho and worked as an educational researcher, responsible for designing course curricula and managing course quality assessment processes. She is currently a learning designer at the Polytechnic of Cávado and Ave in Barcelos. With a passion for adult education, she has also been president of the C.R.I.A. Dialogues Association since 2021.


The short course "Research Methodologies" aims to provide an introductory understanding of scientific research in Administration. This course equips students with the necessary skills to design, develop, and evaluate research plans. As future business managers, students should be able to use data collection techniques and instruments to develop or improve business strategies, such as questionnaires, interviews, and document analysis.

At the end of the course, students should be able to:

  • Understand the characteristics of management research.

  • Explain techniques and instruments for collecting and analyzing data.

  • Write, present, and disseminate scientific work.

  • Understand ethical principles in research.

  • Prepare bibliographical references.


The structure of the search methodologies course:

  • Characteristics and paradigms of management research

  • Techniques and instruments for collecting and analyzing data

  • Research methodologies

  • Writing, presenting, and disseminating scientific work

  • Ethics in research

  • Bibliographical references


This course lays the foundation for both academic success and effective business management by equipping students with the essential skills to conduct rigorous research and analyze complex information.


1. Scientific Activity and Capstone Project Preparation

  • Research Design: The course empowers students to design robust research studies. This includes formulating clear research questions, selecting appropriate methodologies, and collecting and analyzing data systematically. These skills are crucial for scientific investigations and directly applicable to the Capstone Project, where students are expected to conduct independent research.

  • Critical Thinking and Data Analysis: Students learn to approach information critically, evaluate evidence, and draw sound conclusions. This analytical mindset is essential in science and in crafting a compelling Capstone Project that demonstrates a deep understanding of a chosen topic.

  • Scientific Communication: The course helps students develop effective communication skills, enabling them to present their findings clearly and persuasively, both in written and oral formats. This skill is vital for sharing research results within the scientific community and defending the Capstone Project before a panel.


2. Application in Real Business and Management

  • Informed Decision-Making: In the business world, decisions must be based on solid evidence. The course equips students with the tools to conduct market research, analyze competitor strategies, and evaluate the effectiveness of various business initiatives. This data-driven approach minimizes risks and maximizes opportunities.

  • Problem-Solving: Businesses constantly face challenges. The course teaches students to identify problems, gather relevant data, analyze the root causes, and develop effective solutions. This structured problem-solving approach is invaluable for managers at all levels.

  • Performance Evaluation: The ability to measure and compare results is essential for continuous improvement. The course enables students to track key performance indicators, identify trends, and make data-driven adjustments to optimize business outcomes.

  • Innovation and Adaptation: The business landscape is constantly evolving. The course fosters a mindset of curiosity and inquiry, encouraging students to stay abreast of new developments, conduct research, and adapt their strategies to remain competitive.


"Business & Science Method, Analysis & Research Methodologies" provides students with a versatile skillset that is crucial for both academic and professional success. By emphasizing rigorous research, critical thinking, and effective communication, the course empowers students to make informed decisions, solve complex problems, and drive innovation in the dynamic world of business.
targetAudiences: No special requirements. A course for anyone who wants to build career in Business or Science

courseDetails.title: Active Directory: Deploying and managing Certificate Service
courseDetails.shortDescription: Deploying and managing Certificates (ADCS)
courseDetails.longDescription:
The public key infrastructure (PKI) consists of several components, such as certification authority (CA), that help you secure organizational communications and transactions. You can use CAs to manage, distribute, and validate the digital certificates that you use to secure information. You can install Active Directory Certificate Services (AD CS) as a root CA or a subordinate CA in your organization. In this module, you will learn about deploying and managing CAs.


Objectives

After completing this course, you will be able to:

· Deploy CAs.

· Administer CAs.

· Troubleshoot and maintain CAs.

courseDetails.title: 5 Proven ways to make Money Online to get Passive Income
courseDetails.shortDescription: Want a side Passive income that actually pays? . Proven techniques used by beginners and pros to earn online
courseDetails.longDescription:
This intensive, practical course is designed for creators, entrepreneurs, and side-hustlers who want to make money online by building, launching, and scaling repeatable digital products. Whether you’re a freelancer, a coach, a teacher, or someone who simply wants to turn expertise into an online business, this course walks you step-by-step from idea to your first sale and beyond — with a focus on systems that generate reliable passive income.

You will learn not just theory, but an actionable roadmap: how to validate an idea, create a high-quality digital product (ebook, template, mini-course, toolkit, plugin, or digital service), build a simple conversion funnel, price correctly, and use low-cost growth tactics to start earning. The workflow prioritizes speed and ROI: we emphasize small, testable launches that scale — the exact methods that successful creators use to make money online without bloated tech stacks.

This course is modular and outcome-driven. Each module includes hands-on assignments, checklists, templates, scripts, and replayable walkthroughs so you leave with artifacts — not just notes. By the end of the course you’ll have a real, market-tested digital product, a working sales page or marketplace listing, and a 90-day plan to scale it toward recurring revenue and passive income.

Why this course works (practical advantage)

  • Laser focus on digital products with the best risk/reward for new creators.

  • Combines product design, sales psychology, and low-cost marketing so you can actually make money online quickly.

  • Teaches real automation and scaling tactics so income becomes closer to passive income (income that requires little active effort after initial setup).

  • Real templates & code-free tools used throughout — you’ll never need to be a developer to ship a profitable digital product.

Who this course is for

  • Beginners who want to start an online business but don’t know where to begin.

  • Creators who already have skills (writing, design, teaching, coding) and want to package them as a digital product.

  • Freelancers who want to move from hourly work to scalable product revenue.

  • Side-hustlers seeking passive income streams alongside their day job.

  • Small business owners seeking digital extensions of their services (courses, templates, guides).

Learning outcomes — what you will be able to do

By the end of the course you will be able to:

  1. Validate a product idea quickly using low-cost customer research so you avoid common launch failures.

  2. Build at least one marketable digital product (ebook, mini-course, template, or toolkit) with a clear value proposition.

  3. Create a high-converting landing page and simple funnel to collect leads and convert first buyers.

  4. Price your product optimally and choose the right distribution channel (marketplace vs. direct sales).

  5. Set up simple automation for onboarding and up-selling to transform a product into recurring passive income.

  6. Apply promotion tactics (email outreach, content seeding, micro-ads, partnerships) to reliably make money online from your product.

  7. Measure core metrics (conversion rate, CAC, LTV) and iterate to grow your online business.

Course structure — modules & short lesson details

Module 0 — Kickoff & Mindset

  • Why digital products beat hours for scalable income.

  • Defining your goal: revenue, time, and lifestyle targets.

  • Quick tools list & templates you’ll use.

Module 1 — Idea Validation & Niche Selection

  • Micro-research methods (surveys, comment mining, marketplace scans).

  • Quick validation playbook: 3 low-cost experiments to prove demand.

  • Choosing a niche that supports repeat purchases and up-sells.

Module 2 — Product Design & Creation

  • Product formats compared: ebooks, mini-courses, templates, plugins.

  • Content architecture: outcomes-first mapping and modular design.

  • Production workflow: record, edit, publish — minimum viable product (MVP) method.

  • Quality checklist for a marketable digital product.

Module 3 — Pricing & Packaging

  • Pricing psychology and models (one-time, tiered, subscription, license).

  • Bundles and up-sells to increase Average Order Value (AOV).

  • Payment providers, delivery mechanics, and legal basics.

Module 4 — Sales Pages, Funnels & Marketplaces

  • High-converting sales page formula (headline, proof, benefits, CTA).

  • Free + tripwire funnel to convert cold traffic into buyers.

  • Pros/cons of marketplaces (Gumroad, Etsy, ThemeForest, Udemy) vs. direct sales.

Module 5 — Traffic & Growth (How to Actually Make Money Online)

  • Free traffic playbook: content seeding, collaborations, email outreach.

  • Paid traffic primer: micro ad tests that validate offers before scaling.

  • Affiliate & partner outreach for fast credibility and increased reach.

Module 6 — Automation & Passive Income Scaling

  • Setting up email automation (welcome sequence, nurture, cross-sell).

  • Re-usable funnels for evergreen launches.

  • Metrics to track and scale to consistent passive income.

Module 8 — Long-term Strategy & Exit Options

  • Turning one product into a portfolio and full online business.

  • Licensing, white-label, and recurring revenue models.

  • When and how to sell your product or business.

  • Downloadable templates: product brief, sales page copy template, pricing calculator, email sequences, launch checklist.

  • Swipe files: outreach scripts, social captions, ad copy starters.

  • Case studies and screenshots from real launches.

  • Mini assignments after each module — practical work that builds your product piece by piece.

  • Private community channel for feedback and accountability (optional).

Expected timeline & commitment


  • Designed for busy people: follow the 7-day launch plan or complete the full course in 4–6 weeks by devoting 3–5 hours/week.

  • Fast path: complete the MVP and publish a sales page in 7 days.

  • Longer path: iterate and grow for sustainable passive income.

Tools & setup (low-cost)

  • Content creation: Google Docs, Canva, Loom, or basic screen recorder.

  • Delivery & payments: Gumroad, Gumroad alternatives, Payhip, or Stripe + simple site.

  • Email & automation: MailerLite, ConvertKit, or Substack.

  • Optional: simple landing page builders (Carrd, Leadpages, Webflow).

Instructor & credibility

Your instructor  has launched 12+ digital products, generated recurring revenue through course funnels and marketplaces, and helped dozens of students convert skills into passive income. Expect candid breakdowns of wins and failures — and templates that are battle-tested in real launches.


Frequently asked questions (short)

Q: Do I need technical skills?
A: No — the course uses no-code tools and step-by-step templates to remove technical barriers.

Q: How fast will I earn money?
A: Many students see initial sales within the first 7–30 days if they follow the validation + launch checklist. Long-term passive income builds from iteration.

Q: Is this suitable for non-English speakers?
A: Yes — the frameworks translate across languages; localized launches are encouraged.


If you’re ready to stop trading hours for dollars and start building a repeatable online business that earns even when you sleep, this course gives you the practical steps, templates, and coaching to ship a marketable digital product and begin to generate real passive income.
